title: Spec Solicitation Input
description: Input parameters for the interactive specification solicitation process.

change_id.description: Workflow-scoped change ID for the spec being solicited (format: <name>-<seq>, e.g. user-auth-1)

workflow_id.description: Workflow ID for tracking the solicitation (directory format: <id>-<name>)

context_path.description: Path to context.md file providing context from external specs

resume.description: Whether to resume from a previously saved solicitation state
